title: TOWIE's Olivia Attwood continues to show off her engagement ring with fiancé Bradley Dack at filming
text:
She announced her engagement to her on-off boyfriend earlier this week after he romantically proposed in Dubai.

And Olivia Attwood continued to show off her diamond ring as her new doting fiancé Bradley Dack picked her up from TOWIE filming on Wednesday.

The former Love Island star, 28, and her footballer beau, 25, looked loved-up as they cosied up his car after a night of shooting scenes for the hit ITVBe series.

Husband and wife to be: Olivia Attwood continued to show off her diamond ring as her new doting fiancé Bradley Dack picked her up from TOWIE filming on Wednesday

Olivia looked glamorous in a red fur-looking coat with a pair of grey skinny jeans, a white top and a green tartan scarf.

Adding some equally lavish accessorises, the reality star opted for an olive green Chanel quilted handbag, Gucci heeled boots and a gold chain necklace.

Taking centre stage was Olivia's dazzling teardrop-shaped engagement ring which she had resized earlier this week.

The reality star styled her blonde locks into a glamorous blow-dried hairdo and added a slick of make-up.

Sweet: The former Love Island star, 28, and her footballer beau, 25, looked loved-up as they cosied up his car after a night of shooting scenes for the hit ITVBe series

Glamorous: Olivia looked glamorous in a red fur-looking coat with a pair of grey skinny jeans, a white top and a green tartan scarf

Olivia's new fiancé Bradley cut a casual figure as he picked her up in his car, wearing a black hoodie and trousers.

Earlier in the night, the blonde beauty had shot scenes with her co-star and friend Chloe Sims where they were surprised by Pete Wicks wearing a hilariously Halloween mask as a prank.

Olivia was no doubt thrilled to reunite with her TOWIE pals and share her happy news with them all.

Details: Adding some equally lavish accessorises, the reality star opted for an olive green Chanel quilted handbag, Gucci heeled boots and a gold chain necklace

Filming: Earlier in the night, the blonde beauty had shot scenes with her co-star and friend Chloe Sims in the outdoors at night

Co-stars: Pete Wicks also filmed with Olivia and Chloe as they all wrapped up warmly for the outdoor scenes

Hilarious: Pete decided to prank Olivia and Chloe later on in the evening as he donned a scary Halloween mask

Olivia - who has been in an on/off relationship with the footballer, 25, for four years - shared sweet Instagram snaps of the pair kissing along the beach in Dubai on Sunday evening following the romantic proposal.

Flashing her sparkling pear ring in the images, the star joked the sportsman 'must be crazy' as she and her new fiancé posed on the sandy shores of the holiday hotspot.

The 2017 Love Island contestant - who recently underwent a £2,500 jawline, chin lipo and contouring procedure - captioned the photos: 'He must be crazy... Here’s to forever . I love you BD.'

TV star Olivia dressed up for the occasion as she opted for bridal white in a lace gown, while her partner sported a black T-shirt with beige trousers.

Run! The TOWIE veteran crept up behind the two girls as they sat in a Chloe's car

Boo! Olivia and Chloe were left started by Pete who scared them by wearing the mask

Going all out: Chloe appeared to scream as he placed his hands on her car

What's going on? Olivia looked confused by the dramatic prank scenes

Olivia and the Blackburn Rovers midfielder - who jetted off to the sunny country over the weekend - first embarked on a relationship in 2015, but broke up when she appeared on Love Island two years later - where she dated co-star Chris Hughes.

After the breakdown of her seven-month romance with reality star Chris, 26, the blonde beauty went on the search for love as she appeared on 2018's Celebs Go Dating.

Despite flirting up a storm with Diversity's Sam Craske on the E4 show, Olivia rekindled things with hunky Bradley in December last year.

The former grid girl's engagement may come as a surprise to fans as she recently admitted she can't trust Bradley '100%', and even split in April for just under 24 hours.

Laughs: Pete, Chloe and James Lock were seen sharing a laugh at one stage during filming

'He must be crazy': Olivia announced her engagement to Bradley on Instagram on Sunday evening, following a four-year on/off relationship

Olivia told new! magazine last month: 'We row about little things, like house-related things. I'm very OCD and he's very messy.

'I've also got a long way to go with trust. That's my own issue more than his. I don't think you should trust any man 100 per cent.'

Despite her recent comments, the media personality insisted her romance with the Greenwich native is 'more serious than ever' and admitted she's 'old-fashioned' when it comes to marriage in an exclusive interview with MailOnline.

Set to wed! The reality star showed off her sparkling pear ring just moments after her new fiancé popped the question

How sweet: The 2017 Love Island contestant captioned the photos: 'He must be crazy... Here’s to forever. I love you BD' followed by a diamond emoji

Comparing the first time they dated to their current relationship, the bombshell said in June: 'It was a childish relationship, but now we’ve realised what we want.

'We take the relationship more seriously than before. We've eased into living together, it feels quite normal now and he’s an easy person to live with.

When quizzed about marriage plans, the reality star admitted: 'You’d have to ask him about marriage. I’m not old-fashioned at all, but I am when it comes to marriage.'
